title: Yellow Eyes
description: Katrina Castillo is a graduate student at State University when she is plunged into her worst nightmare. Her apartment is burglarized and the police make a grisly discovery. From that point on her world is turned upside down. An unknown entity is after Katrina. He's cunning, knows police procedure and has lots of connections. The police are ill-equipped to deal with such a cunning adversary. He knows Katrina's every move and any move the police make. Can the police protect Katrina and learn the motives of their most challenging adversary before its too late.
author: Sonya Lee
